name: Life Of A Butterfly
description:
Made in 12 hours for this jam. Very Incomplete haha

It was fun to compete in the jam but I spent most of my time trying to get the spider AI to work unsuccessfully. So I decided to just spawn them at random. They also don't do damage as I didn't have time to write the last few lines of script for it ;/

It was a great learning experience and I'll definitely try it again!

Art by: https://alienfrommarsy.itch.io/
